FILE: cm338645v11.0.txt
DYAD: MALTA - IRAQ
RIVALRY: RIV879
DISPUTE(S): MID2548 MID2815 

PSNOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180909
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180909

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2548 

TERRMID: MID2548 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2548 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2548 1 -- third party link to territorial MID 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2548 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2548 from Gibler 2018, in 1985, Iraq attacked a Maltese oil tanker. Attacking countries' oil tankers was a common strategy by Iraq during the Iran-Iraq war, as Iraq was damaging Iran's oil exports. The Maltese oil tanker was carrying Iranian oil. Coded third party link to territorial MID because the Iran-Iraq war was a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2548 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2548 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2548 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2548 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2548 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2548 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2548 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2548 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2548 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2548 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2548 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2548 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


MID2815 

TERRMID: MID2815 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2815 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2815 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2815 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2815 from Gibler 2018, Iraq again attacked a Maltese oil tanker during the Iran-Iraq war in an effort to damage Iran's oil exports. Attacking countries' oil tankers was a common strategy by Iraq during the Iran-Iraq war, as Iraq was damaging Iran's oil exports. The Maltese oil tanker was carrying Iranian oil. Coded third party link to territorial MID because the Iran-Iraq War was a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2815 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2815 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2815 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2815 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2815 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2815 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2815 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2815 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2815 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2815 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2815 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2815 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:
The Maltese ship *Koncar* was hit by Iraqi missiles in the Persian Gulf on November 16, 1985, and another Maltese tanker was hit by Iraqi missiles in the Persian Gulf on January 7, 1986.

SOURCES-CM: 
*Middle East Journal *(MEJ), Spring 1986, 315.

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: 
Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
